strings.string: Cette pierre semble pouvoir se briser.
Mais il semble manquer un objet...
Cette pierre semble pouvoir se déplacer.
Bonjour, bienvenu au centre Pokémon ! Nous allons soigner vos icmons, veuillez patientez un instant
Merci de votre patience, vos icmons ont retrouvé la forme ! A bientôt
Papa ne voudrait pas que j'utilise ça ici...
Bonjour, que puis-je faire pour vous
Cette pierre semble reliée à un signal, peut-être qu'en trouvant comment l'activer on peut la passer
Il parait que si tu as compris le sens de la vie, alors tu pourras passer
On dit qu'il faut savoir ce que l'on cherche pour pouvoir passer...le sais-tu ? Parce que moi pas vraiment...
Sans blague les gens ferment leur porte...
Mais ce n'est pas très efficace !

You must help us ! A great Evil has been plaguing this Town ! For you see, it is now only the mere shadow of what it once was. The DarkLord and his army of zombies flameSkulls and logMonsters, have been tormenting us for now...
almost a decade ! You have to save us and defeat them ! You are the only one who can do it !

Go search for the hidden Temple in the far East, there you will find a magic path that will lead you towards where the most of the DarkLord's army is kept ... Once you have defetead them you should be able to acquire

the allmighty Staff of light and water that will help defeat the Tyran, he can only be weakened by magic ! You'll find some dangerous monsters on your way, so go see at the huntsman's house in the Farm just above here.
He won't mind if you borrow him his equipement to defend our village.
A. Reassure yourself old man, for I will not rest until I have slayed that fiend ! B. No I have better things to do, this is not my problem, goodbye...
Thank you adventurer, here are 400 Zeldollars, as a reward, and to help you in your quest. So long and may the Spirits be with you !
No ... Why ? ... Our last Hope... We are doomed... the DarkLord has won... I already feel the plague gaining me ... This is your fault ...
Through the orb, the arrow will show you the way to the Temple...
